channel.title: My Experience on Nadia Zablah Humbert-Labeaumaz
channel.description: Recent content in My Experience on Nadia Zablah Humbert-Labeaumaz

item.title: Business Insights Host
item.description:
Launched a discussion series to share insights on business and entrepreneurship while showcasing social entrepreneurs.

Achievements

  • • Partnered with guest entrepreneurs and leveraged business expertise to produce high-quality content.

  • • Expanded guest visibility through multi-channel content promotion and distribution.

item.title: Founder & Product Lead — Social Enterprise
item.description:
Launched a collaborative environmental literacy platform designed to make complex environmental issues accessible and reliable.

Conceived and shaped the product through market research, collective expertise, and iterative testing to ensure relevance and usability.

item.title: Executive Advisor — Strategy, Technology & Transformation
item.description:
Advised senior leaders across technology and regulated industries on strategy, organizational change, and complex delivery challenges.

Worked with executive teams to navigate growth, transformation, and regulatory pressure by clarifying priorities and aligning strategic intent with execution.

item.title: Senior Program Manager — Strategic Operations
item.description:
Scaled a French startup’s engineering team internationally, supporting growth while maintaining high quality standards across distributed teams.

Worked closely with executives and product leaders to define strategic priorities, align teams around a shared vision, and establish clear performance indicators.

item.title: Head of Engineering
item.description:
Transformed a SaaS company’s cloud platform to support European market expansion, leading a large-scale legacy system migration that reduced time-to-market and enabled sustained growth.

Worked across engineering, product, and business teams to shape the strategic roadmap, align initiatives, and secure product–market fit during a critical growth phase.

item.title: Senior Consultant & Advisor
item.description:
Delivered advisory and hands-on support to technology companies on execution, delivery effectiveness, and organisational constraints during growth phases.

Focused on diagnosing concrete problems and supporting leaders and teams in translating strategic intent into operational outcomes across diverse client contexts.

item.title: Founder & Managing Director
item.description:
Identified critical unmet needs in the technology sector and transitioned to self-employment to explore and validate market opportunities.

Founded Crafties to address these gaps, delivering strategic and operational support to scaling technology companies.

item.title: Tech Community Leader
item.description:
Founded and led the Kotlin Lyon community in France, dedicated to learning and sharing insights on the Kotlin programming language.

Achievements

  • • Forged partnerships with local companies to host events, expanding networking and skill-building opportunities.

item.title: Software Practices Advocate
item.description:
Created and managed the Crafties YouTube channel, dedicated to sharing insights and best practices in software engineering.

Achievements

  • • Produced and published high-quality content that informed and engaged the software engineering community.

item.title: Founder — SaaS Platform
item.description:
Developed a cloud-based invoicing and compliance platform to help entrepreneurs in Honduras adapt to new regulatory requirements and keep their businesses operational.

The platform translated complex legal obligations into automated, easy-to-use workflows, reducing the risk of fines and closures for small businesses operating with limited resources.

item.title: Program Manager — Technical & Strategic Operations
item.description:
Orchestrated key initiatives for France’s nationwide Linky smart meter programme, coordinating with more than 100 cross-functional stakeholders to support the deployment of millions of connected meters across regions.

Worked across engineering, product, and leadership teams to align priorities, strengthen delivery practices, and improve quality and reliability during a large-scale, multi-region rollout.

item.title: Biotechnology & Software Delivery Lead
item.description:
Led software delivery at bioMérieux for critical medical reagent batch release, bridging biotechnology and software engineering to support reliable and compliant production.

Worked across scientific, engineering, and operational teams to streamline decision-making, reduce risk, and ensure safe, on-time deployment to production.

item.title: Manufacturing & Reliability Lead — Biotechnology
item.description:
Solved a 7-year-old challenge in a pivotal Sanofi Pasteur project by leading the optimization of critical equipment measurement parameters.

Achievements

  • • Delivered substantial gains in operational reliability within weeks by implementing a targeted optimization strategy.

item.title: Social Project Leader
item.description:
Directed a transformative social project in Honduras to renovate a local school, emphasizing community engagement and sustainable development.

Achievements

  • • Strengthened educational infrastructure and expanded learning opportunities by building multiple new classrooms.
